column4: If I want to make 100% sure I will be able to remove a .deb package again what can I do? Wasn't there some kind of check-install command?
what do you mean remove .deb package? just delete it

... my habbit is I keep double click on deb files downloaded from net and not really care about malware... I need to think about it again - I guess...
